name: Combining policies and issuing binders to meet requirements
text: The requirements for a motor vehicle liability policy may be fulfilled by the policies of one or more insurance carriers which policies together meet such requirements. 	Any binder issued pending the issuance of a motor vehicle liability policy shall be deemed to fulfill the requirements for such a policy. [L 1949, c 393, pt of §1; RL 1955, §160-110; HRS ]
